description:
The GREE AI Study Buddy offers a range of features to enhance your GRE preparation:

Study Planning: The AI agent helps you create a customized study plan based on your desired test date, available study hours per day, and specific areas of focus.

Question Bank: Access a vast collection of GRE practice questions across various topics and difficulty levels. The AI agent adapts the question selection based on your performance and areas of improvement.

Intelligent Analytics: The AI agent analyzes your performance on practice questions, identifies weak areas, and provides detailed insights and recommendations to help you improve your skills.

Flashcards: Review key concepts, vocabulary, and formulas with interactive flashcards designed to reinforce your knowledge and aid in memorization.

Progress Tracking: Keep track of your study progress, including the number of questions attempted, accuracy rates, and performance trends over time. The AI agent provides visualizations and reports to monitor your growth.

Study Reminders: Set personalized study reminders and notifications to help you stay on track with your study plan and maintain consistency.
title: Recommendation
